longBusinessSummary: Touchstone Bankshares, Inc. operates as the bank holding company for Touchstone Bank that provides various community banking products and services in Virginia. The company offers personal and business savings and checking accounts. It also provides home mortgage, professional mortgage, home equity, auto, and personal term loans; personal lines of credit; and business loans comprising commercial real estate, operating capital, business term, and construction loans, as well as business lines of credit. In addition, the company offers credit and debit cards; digital banking; treasury services, such as cash management, merchant card, remote deposit capture, and automated clearing house services; financial advisory services; and wealth management services, including financial planning, investment management, retirement income planning, estate planning, and insurance services. Touchstone Bankshares, Inc. was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Prince George, Virginia.
